title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
Fry pancetta or bacon until crisp, add garlic and sauté briefly.
Beat eggs in a bowl, then mix in Parmesan cheese.
Drain spaghetti and combine immediately with egg and cheese mixture off the heat.
Add pancetta and garlic, toss well, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, half of the garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté onion with remaining garlic and ginger until golden.
Add tomato puree, simmer 10 minutes, then add cream.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce, simmer 5–10 minutes, and serve with rice or naan.

title: Pasta Bolognese
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish featuring a rich, slow-cooked meat sauce served over your favorite pasta. Perfect for a comforting family meal.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add onion, garlic, carrot, and celery, and sauté until soft, about 5-7 minutes.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.
Stir in tomato paste and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add chopped tomatoes and red wine (if using).
Pour in stock, add oregano, basil, salt, pepper, and a pinch of sugar.
Simmer gently for 30-45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Cook pasta separately according to package instructions.
Serve the sauce over the pasta, optionally garnished with Parmesan.
